Package ro.tuiasi

Class Text2Audio

java.lang.Object
ro.tuiasi.Text2Audio
public class Text2Audio extends Object
The Text2Audio class provides functionality for handling text-to-speech conversion using the OpenAiService.

    • handleChat

      public String handleChat(String transcribedText) throws IOException
      Handles transcribed text by generating a response and converting it to speech.
      Parameters:
      transcribedText - The transcribed text to be processed.
      Returns:
      The text to be used for speech synthesis.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

    • handleSpeech

      public String handleSpeech(String textForSpeech) throws IOException
      Converts text to speech and saves it to a file.
      Parameters:
      textForSpeech - The text to be converted to speech.
      Returns:
      The file path of the generated speech audio.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

    • playAudioFile

      Plays the audio file located at the specified file path.
      Parameters:
      filePath - The file path of the audio file to be played.
      Throws:
